name: T - Layla Noah
_source: speak;Layla; There's this group of people who came into town, and they say they're here to save us.{w} Some men and women with swords and axes,{w} and a scary one with a bow.
speak;Noah; If they are here to help, maybe we can actually save the village.{w} Stay close to me. We don't know what their true motives are{tgm}...
